data.title: Brief on behalf Gaspar de Segovia of the city of Zaragoza versus José Rodrigo Villalpando and his wife Antonia Oblitas, Marquis and Marchioness of Compuesta and others, concerning certain inheritance
data.meta_description: Title devised, in English, by Library staff. Jurisdiction covered: Spain. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site. Also available on microfilm (Law Library Microfilm 84/10004). Document in Spanish.
data.text:
The contents of the Library of Congress Spanish Legal Documents Collection are in the public domain or have no known copyright restrictions and are free to use or reuse.
